text: To micro-optimize code, look at the generated assembly and look for function calls and branches. Those are typically the easiest thing to optimize away, and give the best results

text: Ponzu yuzu is a very good sauce. <https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ponzu|https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ponzu>

attachments.title: Ponzu
attachments.text:
Ponzu (ポン酢) is a citrus-based sauce commonly used in Japanese cuisine. It is tart, with a thin, watery consistency and nearly colorless.  Ponzu shōyu or ponzu jōyu (ポン酢醤油) is ponzu with soy sauce (shōyu) added, and the mixed dark brown product is widely referred to as simply ponzu.
The term originally came into the Japanese language as ponsu as a borrowing of the now-obsolete Dutch word pons, meaning punch as in a beverage made from fruit juices.  The sour nature of this sauce led to the final su being spelled with the character 酢 (su) meaning vinegar.Ponzu is made by simmering mirin, rice vinegar, katsuobushi flakes (from tuna), and seaweed (kombu) over medium heat. The liquid is then cooled, strained to remove the katsuobushi flakes, and finally the juice of one or more of the following citrus fruits is added: yuzu, sudachi, daidai, kabosu, or lemon.
Commercial ponzu is generally sold in glass bottles, which may have some sediment. Ponzu shoyu is traditionally used as a dressing for tataki (lightly grilled, then chopped meat or fish), and also as a dip for nabemono (one-pot dishes) such as shabu-shabu. It is used as a dip for sashimi. In the Kansai region, it is offered as a topping for takoyaki.

elements.text: Ponzu yuzu is a very good sauce.

text:
Look Ari, if you keep on down the path you're on you'll find yourself facing tough decisions that lead to challenges. Don't overwork yourself, its not worth it. But don't stagnate either ya know.

Also never add concentrated HCl to piping hot toluene sulfonic acid.

Also... in your 20's-30's get as much experience as you possibly can.

Also... Don't leave a party without your pants and sleep through people trying to call if you're okay.

Also don't grocery shop without pants.

elements.text:
Look Ari, if you keep on down the path you're on you'll find yourself facing tough decisions that lead to challenges. Don't overwork yourself, its not worth it. But don't stagnate either ya know.

Also never add concentrated HCl to piping hot toluene sulfonic acid.

Also... in your 20's-30's get as much experience as you possibly can.

Also... Don't leave a party without your pants and sleep through people trying to call if you're okay.

Also don't grocery shop without pants.

text: Also if you get really confused you might have had a concussion, do not proceed to walk around collapsing and smacking your head on random objects. If you do that anyways, and you see white beings made out of light you probably should let your friends pick you up.
